topics.topic: Sync licensing strategies for independent producers — platforms, pricing, catalog management, non-exclusive vs exclusive deals
Music distribution and streaming platform landscape for independents — DistroKid, TuneCore, AWAL, direct-to-fan options, platform changes and trends
Audience building patterns for independent producers/musicians — social media strategies, content creation, community engagement, what's working in 2026
Revenue diversification for independent musicians — teaching, production services, sample packs, Patreon/subscription models, live performance, brand partnerships
Collaboration and networking models for independent producers — remote collab tools, split sheet best practices, finding the right collaborators, building a production team
Music industry shifts and emerging opportunities for independent producers — AI tools, new platforms, changing consumer behavior, emerging genres and markets
Jam session community expansion strategies — new cities, partnerships with music schools/studios, event promotion, building local scenes, online-to-offline conversion
Personal brand building for independent musicians/producers — website optimization, EPK best practices, visual identity, storytelling, press outreach
